StarWars.quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
StarWars.author: Leia Organa

StarWars.quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
StarWars.author: Darth Vader

StarWars.quote: It’s the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs. I’ve outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I’m talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She’s fast enough for you, old man.
StarWars.author: Han Solo

StarWars.quote: The Force will be with you. Always.
StarWars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

StarWars.quote: Why, you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder!
StarWars.author: Leia Organa

StarWars.quote: Never tell me the odds!
StarWars.author: Han Solo

StarWars.quote: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
StarWars.author: Yoda

StarWars.quote: No. I am your father.
StarWars.author: Darth Vader

StarWars.quote: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
StarWars.author: Yoda

StarWars.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
StarWars.author: Luke Skywalker

StarWars.quote: Now, young Skywalker, you will die.
StarWars.author: Emperor Palpatine

StarWars.quote: Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.
StarWars.author: Anakin Skywalker

StarWars.quote: There’s always a bigger fish.
StarWars.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

StarWars.quote: In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view.
StarWars.author: Nute Gunray

StarWars.quote: You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting.
StarWars.author: Shmi Skywalker

StarWars.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
StarWars.author: Yoda

StarWars.quote: Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there?
StarWars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

StarWars.quote: We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it.
StarWars.author: Queen Jamillia

StarWars.quote: I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
StarWars.author: Jango Fett

StarWars.quote: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
StarWars.author: Count Dooku

StarWars.quote: The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
StarWars.author: Chancellor Palpatine

StarWars.quote: Power! Unlimited power!
StarWars.author: Darth Sidious

StarWars.quote: So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause.
StarWars.author: Padmé Amidala

StarWars.quote: You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you.
StarWars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

StarWars.quote: To die for one’s people is a great sacrifice. To live for one’s people, an even greater sacrifice. I choose to live for my people.
StarWars.author: Riyo Chuchi

StarWars.quote: You are the Chosen One. You have brought balance to this world. Stay on this path, and you will do it again for the galaxy. But beware your heart.
StarWars.author: The Father

StarWars.quote: Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will.
StarWars.author: Duchess Satine Kryze

StarWars.quote: “The Sith killed each other, victims of their own greed. But from the ashes of their destruction, I was the last survivor. I chose to pass my knowledge on to only one. I created a legacy so resilient that now you come before me.
StarWars.author: Darth Bane

StarWars.quote: The Sith took everything from me. Ripped me from my mother’s arms, murdered my brother, used me as a weapon, and then cast me aside. Abandoned me. Once, I had power — now I have nothing.
StarWars.author: Maul

StarWars.quote: I am no Jedi
StarWars.author: Ahsoka Tano

StarWars.quote: An object cannot make you good or evil. The temptation of power, forbidden knowledge, even the desire to do good can lead some down that path. But only you can change yourself.
StarWars.author: Bendu

StarWars.quote: If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
StarWars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

StarWars.quote: The garbage’ll do!
StarWars.author: Rey

StarWars.quote: Chewie, we’re home.
StarWars.author: Han Solo

StarWars.quote: You know, no matter how much we fought, I’ve always hated watching you leave.
StarWars.author: Leia Organa

StarWars.quote: Oh, my dear friend. How I’ve missed you.
StarWars.author: C-3PO

StarWars.quote: I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me.
StarWars.author: Chirrut Îmwe
StarWars.source: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY

StarWars.quote: Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost.
StarWars.author: Cassian Andor
StarWars.source: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY

StarWars.quote: Jyn, I’ll be there for you. Cassian said I had to.
StarWars.author: K-2SO
StarWars.source: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY

StarWars.quote: Hope.
StarWars.author: Leia Organa
StarWars.source: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY
